Html.name: Html0
Html.content:
The demo shipped with OpenCms is built with the Apollo template. It presents most of the OpenCms features in action. It is meant to give an impression of what is possible. Therefore, the demo website is already quite complex. Nevertheless, it provides an excellent source of information.

  • To get the most out of the Apollo template and the demo website built with it, read this background information and the related links.
